entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
